original_title: Isle of Man TT: Official Review: TT 2003
overview: Featuring jaw-dropping racing footage from all angles -- with cameras rolling on the course, curbside, in the air and from bikes -- this on-the-edge-of-your-seat video covers all eight races from the 2003 Isle of Man motorcycle event. Emotions run high as speed-demon Adrian Archibald attempts to win the competition in honor of his record-setting teammate, David Jefferies, who tragically lost his life during a practice run.
title: Isle of Man TT: Official Review: TT 2003
